name: TabsList
description:
Groups the individual tab buttons.
Renders a `<div>` element.

activateOnFocus.description:
If `true`, the tab will be activated whenever it is focused.
Otherwise, it has to be activated by clicking or pressing the Enter or Space key.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

loop.description:
Whether to loop keyboard focus back to the first item
when the end of the list is reached while using the arrow keys.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-activation-direction.description: Indicates the direction of the activation (based on the previous selected tab).

data-orientation.description: Indicates the orientation of the tabs.
